channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned vehicle at bottom of Maze Hill, 20th December
item.description:
This car has been here all week. I initially assumed broken down but now seems abandoned. Disabled badge visible on dashboard. Front plate is inside the vehicle.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Trafalgar Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black Bag - Children's Bedroom Furniture/accessories, 20th December
item.description:
It's been there overnight. Nothing, seems to deter lazy and uncaring people, from littering the streets where we live. There's a CCTV camera above the dry cleaners, why isn't the council looking at this footage to prosecute fly tippers? .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping of rubbish, 20th December
item.description:
Flytipping of rubbish bags after events in the church's hire spaces opposite. This happens regularly and encourages vermin because the bags often have leftover food in them.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Northchurch Terrace, Hackney, London

item.title: Outside 36 Mill Lane NW6 1NR, 20th December
item.description:
Hit the pothole yesterday 19/12/2025 evening and I heard a horrible clunk. I noticed that my car pulling to one side and my steering wheel is crocked. I had to return to the location the following day to get the right location for it to report it ,so hopefully responsible Council can fix it!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34, Mill Lane, West Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hi there, I have submitted on a number of occasions a request to plant a new tree outside our house at 22 Fairway. We in fact had a tree there a number of years ago but maintenance teams ie Thames Water etc removed the tree to allow for works. Please Bromley Council we need new tree planting trees on this side of the street to make the street green again! I have noticed lots of trees have been planted around other roads close to Fairway! Thank you and Merry Christmas!, 20th December
item.description:
Please see above.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Fairway, Poverest, Orpington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
